backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining types and CRUD logic for users, products, deals, reviews, carts, and orders with access control enforcement.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature implementations, associated files, components, and test IDs with high-confidence tracking.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to short human-written summaries describing each file’s purpose.
frontend/docs/app-feature-list.md: Documentation outlining the full feature set of the KindLink app including authentication, communities, moderation, and excluded features.
Notes describing mobile‑first layout principles and common screen structure guidelines for the app.
frontend/docs/user-flow.md: Detailed user‑flow documentation covering onboarding, navigation, content posting, moderation, and safety flows.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables, light/dark mode values, and base styling tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting the document title and loading the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the main app layout, authentication gate, onboarding logic, and all TanStack Router routes for the mobile shopping app.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Shows a login screen using Internet Identity with branding and a button to initiate authentication.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Renders the mobile bottom navigation bar with icons, active highlighting, and cart badge count.
frontend/src/components/ChallengeShareCo: Dialog for composing and anonymously submitting challenge completion text with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/CommunityGuideli: Displays an alert banner summarizing community guidelines for respectful behavior.
frontend/src/components/ContentActionsMe: Provides reporting, muting, and blocking actions for content using a dropdown menu and local safety preferences.
frontend/src/components/GoodDeedComposer: Dialog allowing users to write and submit a good deed with optional tags and anonymous posting.
frontend/src/components/HelpRequestCompo: Dialog for creating help requests with category selection, description input, and optional anonymity.
frontend/src/components/MobileScaffold.t: Provides the mobile app layout wrapper and conditionally shows the bottom navigation bar.
frontend/src/components/PostingGuard.tsx: Blocks posting if the user lacks permission and shows an alert message, otherwise renders children.
frontend/src/components/ReportDialog.tsx: A dialog component allowing users to submit a report with a reason, handling validation, submission, and status toasts.
frontend/src/components/shop/AppliedFilt: Displays applied shop filters as removable chips, including vibe tags and price range, with a clear-all option.
frontend/src/components/shop/BrandBackgr: Renders a fixed low-opacity branded background image behind the shop UI.
frontend/src/components/shop/CartLineIte: Shows a cart item with product info, quantity controls, price calculation, and a remove button.
frontend/src/components/shop/CategoryStr: Horizontal scrollable list of category buttons that navigate to a filtered search page.
frontend/src/components/shop/DealCard.ts: Clickable card presenting a deal’s details, discount badge, and preview of included products.
frontend/src/components/shop/FilterSheet: Bottom sheet UI for adjusting price, vibe tags, and sort options, with apply and reset actions.
frontend/src/components/shop/InfluencerP: A decorative animated badge marking an item as an Influencer Pick.
frontend/src/components/shop/OrderStatus: Visual timeline showing an order’s progress across processing, shipped, and delivered stages.
frontend/src/components/shop/PageContain: Simple wrapper providing padded page layout for shop views.
frontend/src/components/shop/Preferences: Form for editing a user's style preferences, including budget, vibes, and categories, with save handling.
frontend/src/components/shop/ProductCard: Displays a product with image, price, tags, wishlist button, and optional influencer badge, navigating to its detail page.
frontend/src/components/shop/ProductGrid: Renders a responsive product grid with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/shop/Recommendat: Shows personalized product recommendations with loading skeletons and horizontal scrolling.
frontend/src/components/shop/ReelItem.ts: Displays a product reel with video or image, play/mute controls, and a shop button, syncing playback with active state.
frontend/src/components/shop/ReelsFeed.t: Scrollable vertical container that arranges reel items with snap scrolling.
frontend/src/components/shop/ReviewsSect: Handles displaying reviews, average rating, and submitting new reviews with authentication checks.
frontend/src/components/shop/Skeletons.t: Provides skeleton loading components for product cards, grids, and deal cards.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to identity changes, invalidating related queries on updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Wraps Internet Identity login/logout and exposes authentication status.
frontend/src/hooks/useDailyChallengeLoca: Stores and retrieves local daily challenge completion data in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling auth client creation, identity loading, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalSafetyPrefere: Manages local mute/block preferences for users using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useReelsPlayback.ts: Tracks active reel index and manages mute/play controls and navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useShopQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for products, deals, cart, reviews, and user profiles using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useWishlist.ts: Hook managing a user-specific wishlist stored in localStorage with add, remove, check, and clear helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables, base styles, and utility classes including shimmer and scrollbar-hide.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint mounting React, providing React Query and Internet Identity contexts.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Onboarding form where users enter basic profile info and save it via shop query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/shop/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart items with quantity controls, product info mapping, and checkout navigation.
frontend/src/pages/shop/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout form allowing profile update, address entry, and order placement.
frontend/src/pages/shop/CollectionPage.t: Shows filtered product collections with price/vibe filters and budget-based collections.
frontend/src/pages/shop/DealsPage.tsx: Renders flash sales and daily deals with skeleton loading states using shop query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/shop/HomePage.tsx: Renders the main shop landing page with category strips, featured products, under-budget sections, and navigation buttons.
Displays detailed order info including items, tracking, shipping address, and total, fetched by order ID.
frontend/src/pages/shop/OrdersPage.tsx: Shows a list of the user's orders sorted by date with status badges and navigation to order details.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ProductDetailPag: Shows a product's images, price, tags, and actions like add to cart or wishlist, fetched by product ID.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays user profile details, navigation shortcuts, style preferences form, and logout option.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ReelsPage.tsx: Builds a reels-style feed of products with video or image previews using playback controls.
frontend/src/pages/shop/SearchPage.tsx: Provides product search with filters, search input, and a grid of filtered results.
frontend/src/pages/shop/WishlistPage.tsx: Shows the user's saved wishlist products or an empty state if none exist.
frontend/src/utils/shopFilters.ts: Implements product filtering by price, vibe/trend tags, and sorting, plus a helper for fetching items under a given budget.
frontend/src/utils/shopFormat.ts: Provides formatting helpers for prices, vibe tags, categories, and order statuses.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, radii, fonts, animations, and enabling dark mode with custom utilities.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app purpose, architecture, features, and configuration notes.
